dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5014 IH: To codify Executive Order 14331 on fair banking.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Barr introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14331 on fair banking.

section.header: Codification of Executive Order on fair banking
section.text: Executive Order 14331, titled Guaranteeing Fair Banking for All Americans (90 Fed. Reg. 38925; published August 12, 2025), shall have the force and effect of law.
